title: Estadio Valentín González
text: The Estadio Valentín González is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Xochimilco">Xochimilco</a>, <a href="Mexico%20City">Mexico City</a>, <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home stadium for <a href="Atl%C3%A9tico%20Capitalino">Atlético Capitalino</a>. The stadium has a capacity of 5,000 people and hosts <a href="Liga%20de%20Balompi%C3%A9%20Mexicano">Liga de Balompié Mexicano</a> and amateur soccer matches.
